task.summary: Default task
Removed Header from the display.
Added proper state swapping for GUIFooter.
Replaced Display States with enums.
Added DialogueParser.
Added proper (and crude) dialogue display and nav.
Split Display into a view (Display, GUIComponent conglomerate) and a model (PromptManager, Adjusts Display).
Added dialogue start functionality on event call.
Added javadoc, revised copy constructor for Combatant subclasses.
Standardized Instruction inputs to a 7-variable standard.
Renamed files for clarity.
Consolidated Opcode into Event wildcard.
Removed Builder pattern in lieu of built-in fluency in Event.
Added Flag skeletons.
Revised Combatant Parser, as well as Flag parsing.
Integrated Flag System into gameplay (Though, in serious need of refactoring in several places)
Removed Generator class.
Various refactoring.
Implemented Grid<T> and implementor skeletons.
Filled Grid<T> implemenation skeletons.
Grid refactored (View is broken, however)
Fixed view (But needs a lot of testing).
Restructured focus (Though view is broken).
Deleted unused classes FocusGrid/FocusRange.
Removed 2D array from CompositeGrid class.
Fixed Focus issues. Everything should be casually functional.
Removed Focus, integrated components with delegating class (CompositeGrid)
Added skeletons for talk, basic attack commands.
Fixed timing issue with flag, shallow copy issue with Flag List duplication in the Combatant class.
Added talk method, in preparation for Event Refactoring.
Added queue in EventQueue for CompositeEvents, moved PendingEvent to Keybinds.
Fixed timing errors.
Added Item Designations.
Combatants are now removed from play if their health drops to 0 or below.
Implemented Enemy-created event additions to the EventQueue.
Replaced placeholders with text in footer.
Fixed issue with Tile Selector being unable to hover over Combatants.
Edited move commands.
Flags can no longer trigger themselves.
Fixed issue where certain keypresses would not submit their acquired messages to the MessageManager.
Cleaned up various sections of code, including all TODOs.
Small changes to Enemy .dat file.
Stopgap measure to make the "talk" command work, for now.
Added "Actor" prompt, which allows selection of target IDs.
Added rudimentary system for selecting Combatants.
Refined Combatant selection with talk commands.
Removed casting Events to subclasses.
Added additional enemies.
Refactored Flag classes to eliminate switch statement in checkForTrigger().
Refactored access levels in Event package.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Refactored access levels in Event package.
